text: Charles Chalk (1876–24 May 1945) was a footballer, born in Gibraltar who played for Rangers, Hamilton, East Stirlingshire, Dumbarton and Partick Thistle. ==References== Category:1876 births Category:Rangers F.C. players Category:Hamilton Academical F.C. players Category:East Stirlingshire F.C. players Category:Dumbarton F.C. players Category:Partick Thistle F.C. players Category:1945 deaths Category:Scottish Football League players Category:Association footballers not categorized by position Category:Gibraltarian footballers
title: Charles Chalk
